trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for a Web server control <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" />.
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem> provides a base class for toolbox items that create Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem> fornisce una classe di base per gli elementi della casella degli strumenti che creano i controlli server Web.

trans-unit.source: This class extends <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and provides the following additional methods:
trans-unit.target: Questa classe estende <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> e fornisce i metodi aggiuntivi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> gets the value of an attribute of the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> Ottiene il valore di un attributo dell'elemento della casella degli strumenti.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A> gets the HTML that represents the initial state of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A> Ottiene il codice HTML che rappresenta lo stato iniziale del controllo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A> gets the type of the associated runtime component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A> Ottiene il tipo del componente runtime associato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem" /> class.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> è impostata su una versione breve del nome del tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the tool for this toolbox item.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem" /> class using the provided type.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> è impostata su una versione breve del nome del tipo.

trans-unit.source: A SerializationInfo object containing information needed to instantiate the Web control through deserialization.
A StreamingContext object.

Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem" /> class using the provided <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> for the current design document.
Creates objects from each type contained in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem" />, and adds them to the specified designer.
An array of created <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> objects.

<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> always throws an exception, indicating that the method is inherited from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and only intended for use with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> genera sempre un'eccezione, che indica che il metodo viene ereditato dal <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> e destinati solo a Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore(System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost)" /> method is only available in Windows Forms.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that describes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
Loads the state of the toolbox item from the specified serialization information object.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> for the current design document.
The type of attribute to retrieve the value of.
Gets the value of the specified type of attribute of the toolbox item.
The value of the specified type of attribute.
The default implementation will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the `attributeType` parameter is anything other than a <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita genererà un <xref:System.ArgumentException> se il `attributeType` parametro è diverso da un <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="attributeType" /> parameter is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute" />.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> for the current design document.
Gets the HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
The HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> for the current design document.
Gets the type of this toolbox item.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of this toolbox item.
The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the Web server control toolbox item.
Initializes this toolbox item.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> used to save the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.
